column4: i am working my awy thru the ubuntu starter guide and i made it ot the section nNetworking Utilities

it's your personal preference, if you're behing a router (which makes a pretty good firewall) I'd say it's over kill, otherwise you can never be too safe
don't take this offensively, but the fact that you're asking, I tell you yes, install it
